author: lgo
msg: (svn_ra_serf__get_file_revs): If the XML response contained an error
message, pass that one up instead of the non-specific serf error.

author: lgo
msg: On the ra_serf-auth branch: during the initial NTLM handshake configure
serf to send requests one by one. This makes sure that requests are sent in
the right order, and that we don't get a whole bunch of failed requests
possibly creating a deadlock when more requests are sent than the server
(finish_report): Only call init_conn_func when the serf connection is
(handle_sspi_auth): If the NTLM handshake is finished, remove the limit.

author: lgo
msg: On the ra_serf-auth branch: build the sspi code on WIN32 and with a version
Define SVN_RA_SERF_SSPI_ENABLED on windows and with serf version >= 0.1.3.
Make code conditional on definition of SVN_RA_SERF_SSPI_ENABLED.
